channel.title: Is firemaking like this for everyone?
channel.description:
I was pking earlier and I went to my skills tab to see if my pot was still active, then I saw this firemaking sprite. Is it like that for anyone else?
[IMG]http://i865.photobucket.com/albums/ab219/vmanlyman/untitled-53.jpg[/img]

item.title: Is firemaking like this for everyone?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

ox random xi:

Sadly, I could see Jagex updating so the sprite is the background…

Perhaps, but based on how their visual judgement works, they wouldn’t make it look like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Is firemaking like this for everyone?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:25, topic:407687”]It takes 83xp to get to level 2. There’s 83 remaining to level.

83 - 83 = 0.[/quote]
Yes, I know. I’m not stupid >.>
The 0 in the runescape font is rather large, I honestly don’t think (in the correct client-designated position) that it would fit under that red line.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:23, topic:407687”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=508964.msg3692913#msg3692913 date=1312239155]

Notice the value for the current xp of firemaking in the tooltip is gone.

You can’t see it because of the circle I made… but if you really want to know, it’s 0 xp.
[/quote]
I’m suspicious because the 0 in the runescape font is rather large.[/quote]

Well it’s 0… Don’t believe me? Cool story.

item.title: Is firemaking like this for everyone?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:17, topic:407687”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=508964.msg3692825#msg3692825 date=1312236458]
The spirit couldn’t have been stretched by the game alone. If it was stretched for you, it would have to have been stretched for everyone since everyone has the same client files. If this really did happen, I’d be forced to think it was a hardware issue if anything.
[/quote]
Sprite*

It’s become my pet peeve now when people say spirit instead of sprite. Anyway I just got back on and it’s back to normal, so I think whoever it was that said when I changed my graphics settings something messed up is right.[/quote]Yeah, like I said in my post, I’d think it would be a hardware/graphical issue and not a client one. And I meant sprite, but my phone autocorrected it to spirit

Read full topic
item.source: Is firemaking like this for everyone?

item.title: Is firemaking like this for everyone?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

rip4d:

The spirit couldn’t have been stretched by the game alone. If it was stretched for you, it would have to have been stretched for everyone since everyone has the same client files. If this really did happen, I’d be forced to think it was a hardware issue if anything.

Sprite*

It’s become my pet peeve now when people say spirit instead of sprite. Anyway I just got back on and it’s back to normal, so I think whoever it was that said when I changed my graphics settings something messed up is right.

Read full topic
item.source: Is firemaking like this for everyone?

item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:3, topic:407687”]Shitty skills you got there >.>

Rofl @ pk2play - Yeah jagex likes updating things to make them look like shit, so don’t be surprised if that’s the next update.
On my screen it’s normal.[/quote]

It’s my F2P pker that I made 2 days ago, so I know the stats are bad. I’m almost 40 attack now though.

@Everyone who thinks I edited this- You’re fucking stupid.

item.description:

rip4d:

I don’t think sprites could really stretch like that considering its straight from an image. Its edited, you can tell by the pixels around the thing.

Why would you edit something like this and post? Its clearly not edited…
